articles.title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world on Saturday - CBC.ca
articles.description: The city in northern Italy that suffered the brunt of COVID-19's first deadly wave in Europe is dedicating a grove of trees as a memorial to the pandemic dead. It's one of multiple memorials to the victims springing up across the globe.
articles.content:
The latest:

articles.author: Maegan Vazquez and Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Biden and European leaders say they're 'convinced' Iran deal can be quickly restored - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden and three of his European allies said in a joint statement on Saturday that they're sure that the Iran nuclear deal can be restored despite talks stalling out over the summer.
articles.content: (CNN)President Joe Biden and three of his European allies said in a joint statement on Saturday that they're sure that the Iran nuclear deal can be restored despite talks stalling out over the summer… [+4750 chars]
